description.value:
Source PZO9445

Price 4 gp; Weight -

Moondew is derived from a potent herb. It is commonly used in the creation of medicinal, protective, and divinatory items.

Alchemical Power Component

Doses 5 (20 gp); Spells divination school

Spells of the divination school are cast at +1 caster level for the purpose of all effects.
